set(THIS_PROJECT CryParticleSystem)
project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_Features
	Features/FeatureAngles.cpp
	Features/FeatureAppearance.cpp
	Features/FeatureAudio.cpp
	Features/FeatureCollision.cpp
	Features/FeatureCollision.h
	Features/FeatureColor.cpp
	Features/FeatureColor.h
	Features/FeatureCommon.h
	Features/FeatureCommonImpl.h
	Features/FeatureField.cpp
	Features/FeatureFluidDynamics.cpp
	Features/FeatureLife.cpp
	Features/FeatureLightSource.cpp
	Features/FeatureLocation.cpp
	Features/FeatureMotion.cpp
	Features/FeatureRenderGpuSprites.cpp
	Features/FeatureRenderGpuSprites.h
	Features/FeatureRenderMeshes.cpp
	Features/FeatureRenderRibbon.cpp
	Features/FeatureRenderSprites.cpp
	Features/FeatureSecondGen.cpp
	Features/FeatureSpawn.cpp
	Features/FeatureVelocity.cpp
	Features/Featurekill.cpp
	Features/Modifiers.cpp
	Features/ParamMod.h
	Features/ParamModImpl.h
	Features/ParamTraits.h
	Features/ParamTraitsImpl.h
	Features/Target.cpp
	Features/Target.h
	Features/TargetImpl.h
	Features/TimeSource.cpp
	Features/TimeSource.h
	Features/TimeSourceImpl.h
)
source_group("Features" FILES ${SourceGroup_Features})


set (SourceGroup_ParticleSystem
	ParticleAttributes.cpp
	ParticleAttributes.h
	ParticleCommon.h
	ParticleComponent.cpp
	ParticleComponent.h
	ParticleComponentImpl.h
	ParticleComponentRuntime.cpp
	ParticleComponentRuntime.h
	ParticleContainer.cpp
	ParticleContainer.h
	ParticleContainerImpl.h
	ParticleConvert.cpp
	ParticleDataTypes.h
	ParticleDataTypesImpl.h
	ParticleDebug.cpp
	ParticleDebug.h
	ParticleEffect.cpp
	ParticleEffect.h
	ParticleEmitter.cpp
	ParticleEmitter.h
	ParticleFeature.cpp
	ParticleFeature.h
	ParticleJobManager.cpp
	ParticleJobManager.h
	ParticleMath.h
	ParticleMathImpl.h
	ParticleMathImplSSE.h
	ParticleProfiler.cpp
	ParticleProfiler.h
	ParticleProfilerImpl.h
	ParticleRender.cpp
	ParticleRender.h
	ParticleRenderImpl.h
	ParticleSpline.cpp
	ParticleSpline.h
	ParticleSplineImpl.h
	ParticleSystem.cpp
	ParticleSystem.h
	ParticleSystemUnit.cpp
	ParticleUpdate.cpp
	ParticleUpdate.h
)
source_group("ParticleSystem" FILES ${SourceGroup_ParticleSystem})


set (SourceGroup_Root
	StdAfx.cpp
	StdAfx.h
)


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root}  )

set(ParticleFeatures_uber_cpp ${SourceGroup_Features}  )
enable_unity_build( "ParticleFeatures_uber.cpp" ParticleFeatures_uber_cpp )

set(ParticleSystem_uber_cpp ${SourceGroup_ParticleSystem}  )
enable_unity_build( "ParticleSystem_uber.cpp" ParticleSystem_uber_cpp )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
	${ParticleFeatures_uber_cpp}
	${ParticleSystem_uber_cpp}
)
#END-FILE-LIST


include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/.. )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} STATIC ${SOURCES} )

USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "StdAfx.h" "StdAfx.cpp" )

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
